history.title: My History
history.subtitle: My professional career and experience
history.paragraph1: I was born in Dosquebradas, a small municipality in Colombia, the country where I currently live. It's curious, since I never lived there, I was just born there, and before I was conscious I moved to Cali.
history.paragraph2: I am a backend web developer and I started in the whole world of programming almost because life forced me to, just like in the Avatar movie where you don't choose the mount, the mount chooses you.
history.paragraph3: My journey in web development began as a necessity, but quickly became a passion. Each project is an opportunity to learn something new and improve my skills. Like this one that was developed almost entirely using Prompt Engineer techniques.
history.experienceDesc: More than 5 years developing modern and scalable web applications.
history.focusDesc: Development of complex solutions focused on business logic (backend).
history.locationDesc: Cali, Colombia - Working remotely for international clients.
